name: Liri-Node-App-
description: This assngment focused on making LIRI. LIRI is like iPhone's SIRI. However, while SIRI is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface, LIRI is a _Language_ Interpretation and Recognition Interface. LIRI will be a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data.LIRI will search Spotify for songs, Bands in Town for concerts, and OMDB for movies.
